C.U.T Student App is a Chinhoyi University Student Android Application developed to help students keep track of their studies.

 The Student App is basically a Timetable app that comes with features like setting adding or creating a Lecture and Tutorials,making Lecture or Tutorial Reminders(Alarms). 

 The application also comes with the message receiving ability.

 Please do note that data loaded from server or internet can change at any time this include your TimeTable,Exam-Timetable. 










 Developed by Kinsley Kajiva –(ICT Student).

Here is a list of all known possible bugs that users may feel or see as they use the application.

 These bugs may not be causing any run-time exceptions but they still need correcting.

 • When renaming the tabs to from the settings sections it may occur that when a user taps the renaming option twice in a activity session the renaming code may wipe out the tab titles hence the tabs and their content.

 • This one is for the developer who may want to update the realm data base , do note that when ever you update the data base or library version some methods may be rendered old or deprecated so go through the CRUD class found DBAccess package, so this could affect the performance of the whole application.

 • Also in updating the code do consider redoing the CRUD class found in DBAccess package to pass the Realm object to the methods in need or in question as i may think that write operations at the moment may be slow than reading operations.

 • When switching from Class TimeTable to Examinations TimeTable as you would have noticed that the whole applications closes and it resets all of the variables this has various advantages.I do hope there will another way of switching and that resets several app runtime conditions. As you would switch from these TimeTables one of the two has to be rendered invalid to use whilst using the other one.

 • As of API 25 and below there is no known way of removing app shortcut at the users home screen(Please Note: this is subject to the users Theme that they have at the moment of using the app).So at the moment if users clear the app cache that also clears the app timetable please do know all preferences or temporary database will be wiped out so ,another short-cut will be created it may annoy the user so by any means in new API (25 + ) do take care of this.
 

 • Thus All.
